OpenBSD

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

Pros

  • Security1).
  • Wide processor architecture support2).
  • UNIX-like OS3).
  • Documentation4)5).
  • Free software only6).

Cons

  • Point release model.
  • Small community & amount of software supported.
  • Supported software7).
1)
Security policy: https://www.openbsd.org/security.html.
2)
Supported platforms: https://www.openbsd.org/plat.html.
3)
Unix-like operating systems: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix-like.
4)
Handbook: https://www.openbsd.org/faq/index.html.
5)
Manpages: https://man.openbsd.org.
6)
Binary blobs: https://www.openbsd.org/lyrics.html#39.
7)
Packages: https://openports.se/statistics.php.
